title: Himi 649
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e fononga Pilikimi
‘A si’i kakai Kalisitiani
Hono taukei ko Kalaisi.
Ki he Fonua fakalangi.
Toe si’i pea a’u
Ki he ‘api ma’u
‘O taka he monū
Pea kaihau.
2.
‘Oku fita’a fau he hala,
Koto tele’a mo mo’unga,
Ka ‘oka ai ha faingata’a
Pipiki pē ki he ‘Otua.
Toe s’li pea a’u, etc.
3.
‘Oku tau ‘alu ai mo tau
Fepaki mōni fili lahi:
Tui koe pea sio pau
Falala kia ‘Ātonai.
Toe si’i pea a’u, etc.
4.
Ko e tapa ‘oku fotu mai
Ke poupou pea fakaa’u:
Ki he Kēnani ‘i he langi
Taka he monū mo kaihau.
Toe si’i pea a’u, etc.
5.
Sīsū ko e fu’u pou ‘ao
Ke fakamalu pea taki:
‘E ‘ikai te ta kei hē fano
He te Ne hā ko e pou afi.
Toe si’i pea a’u, etc.
6.
‘E Sīsū puke nima au,
Tokoni kau ka loto si’i
‘Omi kelesi pē ma’aku
Keu hū ‘o nofo ‘Itāniti.
Toe si’i pea a’u
Ki he ‘api ma’u
‘O taka he monu
Pea kaihau. *
